website_summaries.verdict: Easy slip-on style, wipeable upper and comfortable footbed make this a great sandal for kids.
pros: Comes in black-vivid pink, fire pink-hydrangeas, gamma blue-pink blast and neo turquoise-cobalt tint
Padded, one-piece synthetic strap with mesh underlay
Flex grooves for natural range of motion
cons: Sandal can rip where top meets footbed

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 2 hours of use
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking slide and comfortable. But my son wore ONCE for approximately 2 hours and they are ripping on the sides already. I had read some reviews stating this but thought maybe some of the other kids were hard on the shoe. My son was not hard on the shoe and barely wore them and they are already damaged. Don’t buy these. Poor quality from a brand I usually trust.
customer_reviews.author: shoemama

customer_reviews.title: Two stars is a joke
customer_reviews.text: Tried posting this 4-5 times but it doesn’t show up. The other reviews I wrote in the same time period all posted just fine but none were this negative...does that have something to do with it? What a waste of $22! After wearing these slides about 6-7 times they are falling apart! I find it ridiculous that I can buy a generic pair at drug mart for $3 and they last all summer and a name brand that is seven times more expensive falls apart. I’m not a brand name shopper by any means, but I certainly expected these to last through the summer.
customer_reviews.author: J10L12

customer_reviews.title: cheap material
customer_reviews.text: I bought these slides around 2 weeks ago to wear them inside the house. The sole is made of light squishy cheap foam material that I knew wouldn't last the second I held them in my hands. They also develop wrinkles the second you start wearing them. I've had these less than a month and the insole by the strap is already starting to tear in half I would not recommend these. If they can't last a few weeks as indoor shoes there's no way they'll last outdoors. The size was as expected, a bit snug at the beginning but it'll get worn in by the end of the week and then rip apart soon after.
customer_reviews.author: leftovers

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 1 size up
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son wears a size 1 in all sneakers, dress shoes, and all brands of foot wear. I purchased a size 2 in these Kawa slides and I'm glad I did. The size 2 fits perfectly. I probably could've went for a size 3, but it would have probably been too wide for his narrow feet. I am happy with my decision to go up at least 1 size because the size 1 I purchased from the store was way too small. I recommend customers to go up at least 1 size from your child's sneaker size.
customer_reviews.author: MOM OF  3Top Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Good for Women
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 8.5 women’s shoe. The 6y little kid size fits me perfectly. Better fit than the women’s size which is narrower and tighter. I have a narrow heel too.
customer_reviews.author: mmp

customer_reviews.title: These are sandals. They go on your feet. Job well done.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 8 year old to slip on after soccer practice/games. They do, in-fact, slip on. My only complaint (which is more of a first world problem) is that I would have liked the sandals to come with some sort of bag to store them in. They are often found wild and loose in my daughters soccer bag. I have found myself sandal fishing several times. I would certainly purchase again. Even more so if they included some sort of sleeve to store them in.
customer_reviews.author: michaelsean

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: They’re so cute! Got for my four year old daughter for Christmas, she’s going to love them! Also they are the right size:)
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: They fit great, true to size. He had them for a little over a month and a half, didn’t wear them nonstop at all, and they’re pretty torn up around the toe area. I ended up buying another pair because they are comfortable and he loves them. I would recommend them, but just know that they’re not super durable.
customer_reviews.author: Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Fit exact, very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Comfy house shoes, their sizing chart is on point. I suggest using it. I have long toes and thin feet. And so does my son. I was worried these wouldn't fit... But they all fit perfectly and had tons of cushion!
customer_reviews.author: Poppy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for Nike
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my son wore these sandals less than a dozen times since we purchased them 2 months ago (it has been a rainy spring in Michigan) and they are already ruined. The sides pulled away with less than normal wear. Disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy cheaply made run ex small
customer_reviews.text: Unsatisfied with this. Doesn’t seem like a Nike original sandle it really tight where you slide your foot. And it looks cheaply made. I bought this for my daughter and she is a size 6 I had to get her and 8. Wouldn’t recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Sarai

customer_reviews.title: Not a good slide
customer_reviews.text: My son wore the slides twice and we only had them less than a week and the shoes are falling apart I’m very disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.author: miranda woodard

customer_reviews.title: Good slides for tween
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old has been wearing these all summer so I guess it’s safe to say he likes them. He asked for slides that have a little cushion “on the top part” and these deliver that. They have also gotten wet and we haven’t had an issue with them not drying or smelling.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Fournier

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit small
customer_reviews.text: These are decent shoes. The part with the logo is a rougher texture so it should make cleaning it and wiping it down easier. The cushion part isn't to bad either. I gave 4 stars because they seem to be a bit small. My child wears a 4 reqularly so I'm sized up to a 5 and they fit the exact same as the 4 he had last year. They will get him by the rest of the summer.
customer_reviews.author: AddictedtoAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son kept begging for a pair of his own slides, so he finally saved up his own money to purchase his one pair. Fit great! And didn't have to even leave my house. The only suggestion I have is to have your child wear socks with them until they break in. My son has never worn slides before so he had a little skin break down at first where the shoe meets the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole  Lechner

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes for kids.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 5 year old who hates wearing shoes around the house. I tried these and so far so good. For me, the quality is good for the price. Also, my son told me that his new shoes were comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: WS

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 10 year old son, and he loves them! He said they’re so much more comfortable than any other sandal he’s had. He’s about a 5.5-6, I got a size 6 and it’s a tiny bit large on him but works out perfectly because we still have another month until summer.
customer_reviews.author: Cipriana M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in December and it already broke. My daughter only wore it inside the house. I’m surprised and disappointed as she has another Nike slide for almost 2 years and they are still intact. I got them from JC Penney.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and LIght
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered for my son's size 5.5 feet. He tells me the sandals are quite comfortable and they look like they easily accommodate his feet with a little bit of room to grow. I had intended to purchase the Nike Comfort Slide for him but these Kawa sandals feel soft and comfortable enough that I will wait for these to wear out before trying the NCS.
customer_reviews.author: WRW

customer_reviews.title: Wish they had an adjustable velcro top
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in a size bigger, but we can't seem to keep them on my son's feet. It's hard to push his feet inside the top part. It would be helpful for kids to have a velcro top...easier for getting off and on, and also to make it more "secure".
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: ... two boys had some and asked me for some like theirs. He loves them got them for Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my step son he wanted some since my two boys had some and asked me for some like theirs. He loves them got them for Christmas great quality fits him great
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Be safe and order a size up!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 13 for my daughter and I thought it would be plenty of room for her feet to grow from her current size 12 but her heels come just about to the edge. She’ll get some use through the summer and early fall at least. But they are comfortable on her and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Mossman

customer_reviews.title: boys slide sandal
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my average size 8 year old grandson... wears a size 1 1/2 - 2 shoe. They are great. He doesn't like things between his toes, so this slide is perfect. He likes them and reports they are comfortable to wear in the sand. Win/Win.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverYOUNGTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandal
customer_reviews.text: This is the third year I have bought these for my sun. He thinks they are super comfy. I know I can count on these sandals for comfort and a good fit. The only thing I don’t like is the cloth padding under the strap seems to take a long time to dry and last year it got stinky.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon G

customer_reviews.title: Good price for Nike's! Affordable which is ideal when buying for more than one child!
customer_reviews.text: They are Nikes! They speak for themselves. Great deal on these! Got two pairs, one each for both my kids for the summer and right before summer vacation trip. $19.99 and free shipping with Prime and in one day. Easy for my kids to slip on and off and Nikes! They both said they are comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquline Snider

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old wear size 3 in tennis shoes bc his feet are wide, but size 1 fit him in these slides. They have held up very well. My only complaint is the Nike check won’t stay white, but the wash well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Davis

customer_reviews.title: Feet love the Squishy Squish
customer_reviews.text: Only slides I've found I love. Most are too hard, these last & get softer as you wear. These are my second pair to have simply for convenience, front of the house, back of the house.
customer_reviews.author: LLZAMORA

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, affordable
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! Got a kids size 5 (I am women’s 6.5 sometimes 7 normally) and they fit perfectly, maybe go for size 5.5 next time though for some extra room. Very affordable and comfortable which I like
customer_reviews.author: saraha

customer_reviews.title: Big, Bright and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES them... he has them in Black and out grew them... he kept losing the black ones under his bed... the New ones are so Bright he can spot them anywhere... He chose the color... Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: zoom one

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Hard rubber makes smallness more uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: We had to return these because while they seem great quality they are made small. They didnt fit at all so the hard rubber dug into my foot.
customer_reviews.author: leigh kov

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfy

customer_reviews.title: order 1 or two sizes up

customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter worn this a couple of times at the pool area over the past 1 month and it is falling apartment already. The top part was not glued properly to the sole! I was expecting it to last at least 6 months or so. Very disappointed at the quality!
customer_reviews.author: FLS

customer_reviews.title: Better than buying ladies size.
customer_reviews.text: These slides lasted so long. I love them. Luckily I can use the kids size. Super quick delivery as always from Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Lucky for me, I can fit in both small women's and big kids sizes. These slides are super comfortable. I'm about to buy more pairs for the office, for my mom, etc. They're like walking on marshmallows
customer_reviews.author: RubyxCube

customer_reviews.title: They get big!
customer_reviews.text: Adult size 7.8 here. They stretch out quite a bit after somewhat daily use. Wasn’t expecting that, wish I went down a size
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit for tiny feet
customer_reviews.text: I love this slides and they are the first one my five year old has gotten and I die every time I see her in them they are just so cute on her tiny feet. Great purchase for sure

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves his slides! Rain, sun, snow or shine he is more than likely wearing them! The band is a little tighter than expected, but hopefully they will stretch a little over time.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ricks

customer_reviews.title: Try before you buy shoes😩
customer_reviews.text: Can’t walk with these shoes on to big I order 7-8 the shoe wear 9. I’m not happy🙏🏾
customer_reviews.author: Martha Tucker

customer_reviews.title: I just wasted 28 dollars on these.That is such a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son and after 1 month they broke. I would not recommend buying these
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna

customer_reviews.title: For Narrow, Flat Feet
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is great. Arrived without damages, but it doesn’t fit my sons foot. His foot is too tall for the narrow strap. Should’ve purchase slides with the adjustable fit/Velcro strap option. Not a good fit for anything but small, narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, broke on first day
customer_reviews.text: Definitely don't recommend, broke on the first day. For being Nike definitely it's definitely made out of poor products, rather spend another $40 for a pair that'll actually last long. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I’m a women’s size 6 1/2, these fit great. So cute, very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair of sandals they are really cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: T.E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of slides
customer_reviews.text: My son needed slides, but the ones I usually bought him were cushiony made of material, so when he got them wet, they ripped and became useless. I bought him these and they fit perfectly and can wear in the rain or at the pool and dried pretty well. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: AnaK

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Just bought for Easter. Haven't even worn that much and already breaking. Wouldn't but Nike brand again.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Not just for girls. My son wears a size 2 and these size 2’s are perfect. We use them for trips to the pool or anywhere.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on this shoe.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed these as part of her gymnastics team uniform. We looked around and couldn't find her size and found them on Amazon for a better price than the stores! They are comfortable and run true to size.

customer_reviews.title: Bought these over the summer and have held up great! Fit as expected and the overall quality has ...

product_meta.title: Nike Girls' Kawa Slide (GS/PS) Running Shoe
product_meta.description: The Nike Kawa Kids' Slide Sandal features a soft synthetic strap that conforms to the natural movement of your foot. The cushioned platform of the Nike kids sandal combines plush foam underfoot with a durable, lightweight outsole foam for long-lasting wear.
feature_bullets: KIDS SANDALS: Upgrade your sandals to these Nike slide sandals, offering both style and comfort for everyday wear in a range of colors and sizes.
SYNTHETIC SANDAL STRAP: Nike slides have a soft synthetic strap that conforms to the natural movement of your foot.
SOLARSOFT FOAM: These Nike kids sandals have a solarsoft foam footbed that provides a plush feel under your feet during wear.
WAVY OUTSOLE: Let your foot move naturally while wearing the Kawa Nike sandals thanks to the wavy outsole flex grooves.
SIZE RANGE: Nike Kawa kids slides are available in Big Kids'/Little Kids' size range: 11c-7y.
